Chicago, The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, 2011, 4°, xiv-146 pp., 1 front., 5 tabl., 77 figg. ISBN 978-1-885923-85-1. $29.95. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://oi.uchicago.edu/research/pubs/catalog/saoc/saoc65.html >.]
